string-array.name: video_phrases
string-array.item: (Are)you talking to me?;(Are)you walking with me?;(Are)you mocking me?
(Do)you know who they are?;(Do)you know how far we are?;(Do)you know who we are?
You\'re not going there, are you?;You\'re not from here, are you?;You\'re in front of me, are you?
If I see one, I shall inform you immediately; If I see one, I\'ll should inform you instantly;If I lay my eyes on one, I\'ll notify you immediately

string-array.name: video_answers
string-array.item: Yes, you can;No, you just need to believe;How was your day?
